title: Drawing, "Jascha Heifetz Apartment: Game Room and Bar", 1935
medium: Graphite, red and blue color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
inscribed: Upper center: N; right center: E; at lower right: S.
description: Floor plan for game room and bar, Jascha Heifetz apartment, New York City. Staircase in upper left corner, window on far wall to left, table and four chairs in upper left corner. Wraparound five-section sofa in upper right corner. Fireplace on upper right wall fronted by table. Chair or table to right of fireplace. Curved bar in lower right corner with shelves or cabinets behind bar. Six round bar stools in blue surrounding bar. Doorway and window on lower left wall, across from bar. Doorway on lower wall to left. Blue floor pattern extending from top left and center, outlining shape of bar and towards bottom left. Right half of plan showing red floor design.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Jascha Heifetz Apartment: Game Room and Bar", 1935.
1935. Graphite, red and blue color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-240.
